snippet.title: Boy shoots himself with gun found in home
snippet.content: POLICE in the US say a four-year-old child has died after shooting himself with a gun he found in his house. The shooting happened about 5.45pm local time (7.45am AEST) in Tampa, Florida. In a news release, police said Ashton Gooding found the weapon and discharged it. He was severely injured when police arrived and died shortly after arriving at Tampa General Hospital. The state attorney's office is reviewing the case to determine whether charges should be brought. No further details were immediately available. More to come. Originally published as
